page.title: Terms & Conditions
page.subtitle: Terms of Service for Boston Pizza House

sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
content: By accessing and using Boston Pizza House's website and services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

subsections.title: Order Acceptance
subsections.content: All orders are subject to acceptance by Boston Pizza House. We reserve the right to refuse any order for any reason.

subsections.title: Pricing
subsections.content: All prices are listed in USD and are subject to change without notice. Prices include applicable taxes and fees.

subsections.title: Payment
subsections.content: Payment is required at the time of order placement. We accept major credit cards and cash for pickup orders.

subsections.title: Order Modifications
subsections.content: Order modifications or cancellations must be made within 5 minutes of placing the order by calling our restaurant directly.

sections.id: delivery If & When we do Delivery
sections.title: 3. Delivery Terms

subsections.title: Delivery Areas
subsections.content: if and when we do delivery We deliver within a 5-mile radius of our restaurant location. Delivery times are estimates and may vary based on weather, traffic, and order volume.

subsections.title: Delivery Fees
subsections.content: A delivery fee of $3.99 applies to all delivery orders. This fee is not a tip and does not go to the driver.

subsections.title: Minimum Orders
subsections.content: A minimum order of $4.00 (before tax and delivery fee) is required for delivery.

subsections.title: Contact Requirements
subsections.content: You must provide a valid phone number and address. Someone must be available to receive the order at the specified address.

sections.title: 4. Food Safety & Allergies
content: Please inform us of any food allergies or dietary restrictions when placing your order.
While we take precautions, our kitchen handles common allergens including wheat, dairy, nuts, and shellfish.
Boston Pizza House cannot guarantee that any menu item is completely free from allergens.
Customers with severe allergies should exercise caution when ordering.

sections.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
content: Greenland Famous Pizza House's liability is limited to the cost of the food ordered.
We are not responsible for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.
In case of any issues with your order, please contact us within 24 hours.

sections.title: 6. Refunds & Returns
content: Refunds are provided at our discretion for orders that are significantly delayed, incorrect, or of poor quality.
Food items cannot be returned once picked  up due to health and safety regulations.
Refund requests must be made within 24 hours of order completion.

sections.title: 7. Privacy
content: Your privacy is important to us. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for information about how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

sections.title: 8. Modifications to Terms
content: Greenland Famous Pizza House reserves the right to modify these terms at any time.
Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website.
Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of modified terms.

sections.title: 9. Contact Information
content: If you have any questions about these Terms & Conditions, please contact us:
